searchField.description: Select the field whose text should be used to search on Forvo.

audioField.description: Select the field where the audio should be put in.

language.description: The language of this deck that will be used to search on Forvo. [See all possible options](https://github.com/realmayus/anki_forvo_dl/blob/main/assets/languages.json)

preferredCountries.description: Define countries from which you prefer pronunciations. This can be useful, if you want to download an audio file with a specific dialect.

audioFieldAddMode.description: Allows you to specify how the audio string should be added to the audio field. You can choose between 'prepend', 'replace' and 'append'.

skipExistingBulkAdd.description: Skip cards that already have content in the audio field (Bulk add mode)

playAudioAfterSingleAddAutomaticSelectio.friendly: Play audio after automatic selection (single add)
playAudioAfterSingleAddAutomaticSelectio.description: Play the audio that was selected automatically when the shift key was held down when pressing the blue forvo button in the editor

replaceCharacters.description: A list of characters that should be removed from the search term before searching on forvo.
